Text.text: The focus of the worklist floorplan is on processing items. This differs from the list report floorplan, which focuses on filtering content to create a list.
From a technical perspective, a worklist is a simplified list report without a filter bar.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: For worklists, the FilterBar and Variant Management are deactivated by settings in the manifest.json file. By default, there is no Go button to load the data - therefore the initialLoad option is active.
